mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(avg(rating), 1) AS rating_avg FROM reviews WHERE pno = #{pno};
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE pno = #{pno} ORDER BY pno DESC
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE uno = #{uno} AND pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (pno, uno, title, comment, rating, up, down, created, updated) VALUES (#{pno}, #{uno}, #{title}, #{comment}, #{rating}, 0, 0, current_timestamp, current_timestamp);
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET comment = #{comment}, updated = current_timestamp WHERE uno = #{uno}
UPDATE reviews SET up = up + #{up} WHERE pno = #{pno}
UPDATE reviews SET down = down + #{down} WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reviews WHERE pno = #{pno} AND uno = #{uno}
